Package net.sf.mmm.util.query.api.feature

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FeatureAndFrom<SELF extends FeatureAndFrom<SELF>>
    StatementFeature for a Statement with support for #innerJoin block.
    FeatureDelete
    This is the abstract interface for a StatementFactory supporting a DeleteStatement.
    FeatureFetch<E>
    A FeatureFetch is for a regular SelectStatement to fetch and retrieve results.
    FeatureGroupBy<SELF extends FeatureGroupBy<SELF>>
    This is the abstract interface for a Statement allowing a GROUP BY clause.
    FeatureHaving<SELF extends FeatureHaving<SELF>>
    This is the abstract interface for a Statement allowing a HAVING clause.
    FeatureInnerJoin<SELF extends FeatureInnerJoin<SELF>>
    StatementFeature for a Statement with support for INNER JOIN block.
    FeatureInsert
    StatementFactoryFeature for a StatementFactory supporting a InsertStatement.
    FeatureLet<SELF extends FeatureLet<SELF>>
    StatementFeature for a Statement with support for LET block.
    FeatureLimit<SELF extends FeatureLimit<SELF>>
    StatementFeature for a Statement with support for FeatureLimit.limit(int).
    FeatureModify
    StatementFeature for a Statement that modifies data.
    FeatureOrderBy<SELF extends FeatureOrderBy<SELF>>
    StatementFeature for a Statement allowing an ORDER BY clause.
    FeaturePaging<SELF extends FeaturePaging<SELF>>
    StatementFeature for a Statement with paging support via FeatureLimit.limit(int) and FeaturePaging.offset(long).
    FeatureSelect
    StatementFactoryFeature for a StatementFactory supporting a SelectStatement.
    FeatureSet<SELF extends FeatureSet<SELF>>
    StatementFeature for a Statement allowing a SET clause.
    FeatureUpdate
    This is the abstract interface for a StatementFactory supporting a UpdateStatement.
    FeatureUpsert<SELF extends FeatureUpsert<SELF>>
    StatementFeature for a Statement supporting an USPERT what is a mix of an insert and an update.
    FeatureValues<SELF extends FeatureValues<SELF>>
    StatementFeature for a Statement allowing a VALUES clause.
    FeatureWhere<SELF extends FeatureWhere<SELF>>
    StatementFeature for a Statement allowing a WHERE clause.
    StatementFactoryFeature
    Marker interface for a feature of a StatementFactory.
    StatementFeature
    Marker interface for a feature of a Statement.
